attributes.action: Give class C lorry drivers the CE category so they can drive articulated lorries
attributes.additional_details: This will help with the lorry driver shortage as more driver will be able to driver artic lorries to help supermarkets etc get their deliveries and maybe offer car drivers a cash incentive to to get their C licence or CE license.
attributes.background: To give current class C rigged lorry drivers the CE category so that they can drive articulated lorries.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/596865
